presentation.description: Hi, my name is CÃ©dric and I'm a passionate and motivated junior front-end web developer. After completing an intensive 11-month training course in front-end web development, I obtained a BAC +2 diploma. I'm currently looking for a job as a front-end web developer to put the skills I've acquired into practice. I'm interested in both permanent and fixed-term contracts, which will allow me to contribute to innovative projects and continue to develop my skills in this constantly evolving field, and I believe that my portfolio reflects my commitment and creativity in designing fluid and interactive user interfaces. I'm looking forward to working with a dynamic team to create exceptional web experiences.
